name: My Dear Sister
description:
WELCOME TO FELLOWS FAMILY MANSION

After 10 years, Alice receives a letter from her lost twin sister Astrid, and now she stands in front of Fellows Family Mansion.
She looks at the letter and the family photo under the heavy rain, her childhood memories are so dark.

Why she lost her twin sister?
What was the secrets of Fellows Family?
Why did they leave her to a foster family after Astrid’s disappearance?

On a dark November night, Alice should solve Astrid’s puzzles to find the answers of these questions.

My Dear Sister
It is a single player story horror game.
It is a game where players will progress by solving various puzzles and solve mysteries.
